name: MarRoon
description:
MarRoon is a game that I have been working on for the last year. It is a first person shooter game with stunning graphics and can run on most of the computers.

Be ware the game is still under development.

You are welcome to post you comments and report bugs down below

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

2080, earth has been polluted. Human moved to other planets. Money is no longer usable. The only currency is the ion crystal. It is the essential fuel for a space craft to accelerate to light speed. You were sent by your boss to steal one of the biggest ion crystal stored in a Mars military base.

xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
